Advancement Rules
Skill advancement uses the Downtime Learning System (see DOWNTIME-LEARNING.md). In short:

â€¢ Each tier requires accumulating Learning Points (LP) toward a threshold â€¢ Each downtime period, choose a learning method (Self-Study, Peer, Instructor, Academy) and roll â€¢ Higher tiers require more LP, more credits, and restrict your learning methods â€¢ T1-T2: All methods available, no credit cost â€¢ T3: 300 cr + Peer Learning or better (no self-study) â€¢ T4: 800 cr + Instructor or Academy only + narrative milestone
